a.n: Thomas & Friends: Big World! Big Adventures! XXIII (18)

p.k: In Italy, Thomas wants to sing opera like Lorenzo and Beppe, but ends up just shouting loudly. His friends warn him not to strain his voice, but he keeps trying, getting louder and louder until he loses his voice completely! So when Mia gives him a very important message to give to Stefano, he must find a new way to pass it on.
